{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_OR_Move}} {{Special|92|po, speed, angle, distance|Polyobject|Move, OR}}
Moves a polyobject.
* ''po'': polyobj to move * ''speed'': how quickly the polyobj should move * ''angle'': direction the polyobj should move (this is a [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]]) * ''dist'': distance to move
The “OR” in this special stands for OverRide. Under normal circumstances, if a [[polyobject]] is doing something, you cannot make it do something else until it has finished whatever it is doing. This can be a problem with perpetual polyobjects (such as [[Polyobj_RotateLeft]] or [[Polyobj_RotateRight|Right]] with a [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]] of 255). Using one of these four [[Action_Specials#Polyobjects|specials]], you can force the polyobject to stop whatever it is doing and do something else.
